item.title: 211 Willesden lane, 11th December
item.description:
The council must clean street outside construction site at 221 Willesden lane. Council also should contact the developer of this construction site about securing their site properly. Antisocial behaviour has been seen after hours. Graffiti is all over the broken gate. Rubbish such as bed mattress have been dumped outside. Please can this site be maintained adequately during construction to avoid such behaviours and activity.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Someone has been letting their dog poo on the street of Westbury road se20 7ql, 11th December
item.description:
